channel.title: Battlefield 1942 released for free
channel.description:
[url]https://store.origin.com/store/ea/en_US/html/pbPage.demos-en_US[/url]
EA just released BF1942 for free on Origin.
If you never tried it before, now's the time.

item.title: Battlefield 1942 released for free
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
I’ll be betting a lot of people pass on this due to origin. But I already have the BF3 launcher on my pc so I might as well upgrade it to a BF3+1942 launcher.

Read full topic
